metadata.title: CVE-2013-1904 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Absolute path traversal vulnerability in steps/mail/sendmail.inc inRoundcube Webmail before 0.7.3 and 0.8.x before 0.8.6 allows remoteattackers to read arbitrary files via a full pathname in the _valueparameter for the generic_message_footer setting in a save-perf action toindex.php, as exploited in the wild in March 2013.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1904` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 0.7.2-9
roundcube-core - 0.7.2-9
roundcube-mysql - 0.7.2-9
roundcube-pgsql - 0.7.2-9
roundcube-plugins - 0.7.2-9
roundcube-sqlite3 - 0.7.2-9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7.2-9').
